com.threerings.jpkg.debian
Class PackageInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.jpkg.debian.PackageInfo

public class PackageInfo
extends Object

Stores meta information needed to create a new Debian package.

See Also:
Debian Policy Manual
